Title: 6 Hours Till Hedonism II
Writer: Adam DeVine, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dave King (staff writer)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Lori Alan
Plot: The guys have 6 hours to get Blake a passport, or they'll miss their Thanksgiving trip to Hedonism II.
